communities.name: Cambridge
communities.headline: New Construction Homes In Flowery Branch, GA
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to announce Cambridge, a collection of new homes northeast of Atlanta and convenient to Lake Lanier in Flowery Branch, GA. Only three miles from I-985 and within 10 minutes of three Lake Lanier boat launches, living at Cambridge makes commutes a breeze and relaxing on the weekends even easier.Eastwood Homes offers a unique and distinguished collection of home designs and layouts. With each home thoughtfully designed and curated, including popular home plans with inviting exteriors, designer kitchens, comforting gathering spaces, and multi-floor plan options.Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Marble Tree
communities.headline: Now selling!
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to announce Marble Tree, located just off I-575 in the historic town of Ball Ground, nestled in the Appalachian foothills on the northern edge of metro Atlanta. Marble Tree is a short drive to charming downtown Ball Ground which features new breweries, coffee shops, shopping, and more!Marble Tree offers a distinctive collection of new home designs and some of Eastwood's most popular home plans, all with thoughtfully designed interiors, inviting exteriors, optional side-entry garages, third-floor bonus rooms, and covered rear porches with incredible interior detail.

communities.name: Parkview
communities.headline: Final Opportunities - New Construction Homes in Cumming, GA
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to announce Parkview in Cumming, Georgia. Parkview features all brick homes with covered rear porches, home designs with abundant natural light, and larger homesites that average 1/3 to 1/2 acre in size. Parkview's intimate, park-like setting is adjacent to popular Matt Park with a lighted path to the park's amenities which include playgrounds, a pavilion, tennis courts, and soccer and lacrosse fields.Residents will enjoy shopping, dining, top-rated Forsyth County schools, and other conveniences less than two miles away. Plus, just a short drive from Parkview is Suwanee Mountain Park for hiking, Georgia Premium Outlets for shopping,  and GA-400, and Hwy 369 for connectivity within the greater area. With only 23 homes and low Forsyth County taxes, there are limited opportunities to call Parkview home. Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Sunrise Cove at Great Sky
communities.headline: Final opportunities on new construction homes near Woodstock, GA
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to build an array of gorgeous new homes in Sunrise Cove at Great Sky, one of northern Georgia's most sought-after master-planned communities, located in Cherokee County. Nestled along the banks of the Hickory Log Creek Reservoir and with the northern Georgia mountains as a serene backdrop, Sunrise Cove at Great Sky features incredible amenities, sweeping views, and a community that feels like home.Eastwood Homes offers slab and basement homesites, ranch-style, and two-story plans, plus homes with first-floor primary suites, gorgeous kitchens, thoughtfully-planned gathering spaces plus much more. Final opportunities! Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Twin Lakes
communities.headline: Lake Living In A Northeast Atlanta Suburb
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to build new homes in Twin Lakes, a community of ranch-style, two-story, and basement homes located in Hoschton, GA, a northeast Atlanta suburb located in Jackson County. Twin Lakes is a 940+acre master-planned community with two beautiful lakes as the centerpiece of the neighborhood.Twin Lakes' outstanding amenities include a pool, cabana, playground, dog park, nature trails, and waterfront fun by the lake! Plus, Twin Lakes is less than three miles from I-85 for easier commutes and connectivity to the northeast Atlanta area, convenient to historic, downtown Braselton, and a short drive to the winery, spa, and fine dining at Chateau Elan and fun at Lake Lanier. Schedule your visit today!

The second floor features four bedrooms, including the primary suite, a hall bath, a large laundry room, and a loft area.Options available to personalize this home include an office with French doors in lieu of the formal living room, a first-floor powder room or additional closet, a designer kitchen option, an alternate kitchen layout with a separate butler's pantry, sunroom, screen porch or covered rear porch, luxury primary bath options, a Jack and Jill bath option, and an optional third floor with bedroom and full bath.

homes_rtb.description: The Hamilton is a two-story, three-bedroom, two-and-a-half-bath home with a three-car tandem garage, formal living room, formal dining room, oversized kitchen with large island and walk-in pantry, upstairs loft, and spacious bedrooms with large closets.Options to personalize your home include a covered rear porch, screen porch, or sunroom, office with French doors in lieu of the formal living room, den or guest suite with full bath in lieu of the third car tandem garage bay, informal dining extension, optional butler's pantry, optional Jack and Jill bath on the second floor, bedroom four on the second floor, third-floor bedroom and full bath option, and several primary bath layouts.

homes_rtb.description: The Colfax is a spacious, two-story, four-bedroom, three-and-a-half-bath home with a formal dining room, office with French doors, spacious kitchen, breakfast area, and family room, a walk-in pantry plus a separate butler's pantry. The second floor features all bedrooms including the primary bedroom with two walk-in closets, a loft area, and a laundry room. Bedroom four features its own bath, perfect for a guest suite.Options available to personalize this home include a covered rear porch, screen porch, sunroom, first-floor guest suite with full bath, enclosed bonus room in lieu of upstairs loft area, several primary bath options, plus much more.

division.name: Atlanta
division.subheadline: Welcome to the Peach State's largest city!
division.intro: New construction home builds and move in ready new homes for sale in Atlanta, one of the South's most vibrant cities.
division.description: Atlanta is a sprawling city with a rich history and a southern hot-spot known for its sports teams, cultural must-sees, and booming economic development. Home to 26 Fortune 1000 company headquarters, including The Home Depot, Delta Airlines, Coca-Cola, and more, plus home to the 7th busiest airport in the world, Atlanta is a top destination for visitors to relax and unwind and for residents to make the area their home.

highlights.name: Pro Sports
highlights.description: If you're looking for a professional sports atmosphere, look no further than Atlanta, GA. With five pro sports teams including MLB team Atlanta Braves, Atlanta Falcons of the NFL, Atlanta Hawks of the NBA, Atlanta Dream of the WNBA, and the newest addition to MLS, Atlanta United FC, there's a team, and sport, for everyone!

highlights.name: Aquarium
highlights.description: The Georgia Aquarium, located downtown, features over 10,000 gallons of water and over 100,000 animals and serves as a research and study atmosphere as well as a top tourist destination. Visitors from around the world enjoy dolphin and sea lion presentations, an exclusive Behind the Seas tour plus much more!

highlights.name: Coca Cola
highlights.description: Coca-Cola was created in 1886 in Atlanta by Dr. John S. Pemberton. Today, more than 130 years later, you can enjoy Coca-Cola history and fun, including sampling Coke and other Coke products from around the world at World of Coke!
